metadata.title: Adaptive Cards Mobile - Official Sample Catalog
metadata.description: Index of official Adaptive Card samples fetched from Microsoft's AdaptiveCards GitHub repository

official-samples.description: Complete scenario cards from the official Adaptive Cards sample gallery (v1.5 and v1.6)

element-samples.description: Element-focused samples demonstrating individual Adaptive Card elements and properties

teams-samples.description: Template/data pair samples for Adaptive Card templating with ${} bindings, $data iteration, and $when conditions

samples.name: Activity Update
samples.description: Task activity update card showing creator info, facts, and action buttons for due date and comments

samples.name: Agenda
samples.description: Calendar agenda card with event details, organizer info, and response actions

samples.name: Application Login
samples.description: Login form with username/password inputs and submit action

samples.name: Calendar Reminder
samples.description: Calendar event reminder with date, time, location, and snooze options

samples.name: Expense Report
samples.description: Expense report approval card with line items, totals, and approve/reject actions

samples.name: Flight Details
samples.description: Flight booking details with departure/arrival info and airline branding

samples.name: Flight Itinerary
samples.description: Multi-leg flight itinerary with layover details and boarding info

samples.name: Flight Update Table
samples.description: Flight update using Table element for structured data display

samples.name: Flight Update
samples.description: Flight status update notification with gate and time changes

samples.name: Food Order
samples.description: Food ordering card with menu items, quantities, and order submission

samples.name: Image Gallery
samples.description: Image gallery showcase using ImageSet element
